message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this unique product. Given its incredible value and potential, I'm starting the bidding at $1,200,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and understand the value of the product. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, however, the value of this product is truly exceptional. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,125,000.  This is a very competitive offer for something of this caliber.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,075,000.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm aiming for a price that reflects the true value of this product. I can come down to $1,100,000. This offer stands as a testament to my desire to see this deal through with you.
I appreciate your effort in lowering the price, Alice. Based on my budget considerations, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000.
